channel.title: End in World 2?
channel.description: Would it be possible to get an End in World 2? It would be nice to have one. :P

item.title: End in World 2?
item.dc:creator: @317guy 317guy
item.description:
@317guy wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I was thinking to make it more legitimate, just tunneling to some secret location and placing it there, then you guys would have to activate it like a regular end portal?

I Actually really like that idea

Read full topic

item.title: End in World 2?
item.dc:creator: @the_hybrid1995 the_hybrid1995
item.description:
@the_hybrid1995 wrote:

Place 1-5 random end portal tiles (not full portals, just one block #119) at random locations in the map under ground.

When a player finds it, they can have you ‘activate’ it by adding the second tile and surrounding it with the end stone.

?

Read full topic

item.title: End in World 2?
item.dc:creator: @the_hybrid1995 the_hybrid1995
item.description:
@the_hybrid1995 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:444676”]The issue with the end in w2 is how would you get there? Where would the portal be?[/quote]A possible solution would be either a portal-room @ spawn, or a /end command once every 24-48 hours?

That, or design some really cool puzzle thing for them to get to the portal floating in the sky

Read full topic

item.title: End in World 2?
item.dc:creator: @the_hybrid1995 the_hybrid1995
item.description:
@the_hybrid1995 wrote:

[quote=“deathwilldie0, post:4, topic:444676”]I wouldn’t mind having the end in w2 reset if it’s added. Then we all would have somewhere where we could actually defeat the dragon.[/quote]What about the people whom only play world one? We couldn’t just go to world two to kill the dragon, as it’s rather difficult to kill the dragon if you have no items.

I think a plugin of any sort to spawn the dragon would be best.

Read full topic

item.title: End in World 2?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’d like to tackle a few issues relating to the end first though, a key example is the ender dragon. Moparisthebest did want to reset the map every so often but obviously people started building in the end and so on, so that became an issue. I’ve been looking at various plugins, for example:

http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/fun-dragonslayer-v1-0-spawn-and-fight-that-nasty-dragon-1-2-5-r1-0.62573/

That could be executed by an admin every so often (We have an even timezone distribution as well, zuppers in the US, and I’m in the UK). Though, if it can be done automatically somehow do share.

Once that’s settled, then I think an end will be possible for W2. Though we have a lot on our to do list right now.

Read full topic
